row.name: UC4RB_TC_RES_TYPE#
row.xui: <text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_TC_RES_TYPEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Resource Type" tooltip="If you specify the 'Resource type' request parameter, the value must be the fully qualified Java class name of the resource type you are interested in (for example, you would specify javax.sql.DataSource to acquire the names of all available JDBC data sources).
